video.title: Vecinos
video.synopsis: Thirteen residents go through all the usual trials and tribulations neighbors face as they try to live next to each other in peace and harmony.

episodes.synopsis: As Silvia moves into her new apartment building, she encounters a variety of characters who are trying to find their way in the world.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: When Silvia's father comes to visit, he's expecting her to have a boyfriend. Germán finishes painting the building, but his work is ruined by vandals.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Luis is upset because his bedroom shakes when Lorena turns on her washing machine, so he asks Germán to organize a meeting with the neighbors.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Don Roque mistakenly believes his granddaughter is going to die after he misunderstands a phone message about a chimpanzee with a heart condition.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Two men visit the building bringing a message of internal light. Nobody's interested in what they have to say, so Germán decides to kick them out.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Germán dresses up as a Mexican wrestler and uses his disguise to get at the Rivers' belongings, so Lorena calls for a meeting among the neighbors.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Germán's cousin, Magdalenita, stays with him while looking for work, and she ends up falling in love and moving in with Marco.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Germán asks each of the neighbors for their maintenance fee, but they all have excuses, so he comes up with a plan with Benito to evict them.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The residents are in trouble, because Matías the garbage man is not picking up their trash. Magdalena leaves her trash by Silvia’s door.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Lorena suspects that Luis and Pedro are gay, and tells all the neighbors. Vanessa realizes what’s really going on is they have a secret business plan.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Silvia offers to organize a traditional dress party, but no one is interested in helping out. Silvia and her friend are the only ones who dress up.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Frankie steals Silvia’s cable. Germán installs Pedro’s cable. Lorena reports the stolen cable and an assistant shows up. Silvia gets blamed for it.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: A meeting of the residents is held to talk about the maintenance work that needs to be done on the building, called at Silvia’s to watch the game.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Luis and Magdalena argue when they park their cars in the same spot. Magdalena blocks the way so Luis’s car can’t get out, making him late to work.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Luis and Pedro’s apartment is infested with cockroaches, and the residents demand an exterminator. Germán has a better plan. Silvia gets poisoned.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Silvia and Claudia confront Magdalena over the noise she’s making. Eduardo arrives at Silvia’s house and hears Magdalena’s footsteps in heels.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa is worried that owls will become extinct in Virginia, so Silvia and Germán talk to the residents to organize a charity garage sale.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana, Luis’s sister, comes to visit for Halloween, and they organize a party with a costume contest. Silvia and Frankie compete for first place.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: The trash cans are going missing and the residents decide to start locking the door. But when everyone loses their keys, Germán refuses to help them.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Lorena wants to install a jacuzzi. Germán recommends Mezclas, who charges in advance and then disappears. The remodeling generates noise complaints.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Germán is sick and the residents split up the chores. But when they tell Germán not to worry, they’ve found a new manager, he makes a sudden recovery.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: All the residents pick Don Roque as the administrator, but when they complain about him, he punishes them by turning off the electricity.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Germán organizes a meeting for the nativity contest, and they decide to put on a pageant. Germán wants to keep the spotlight on the nativity.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Germán charges the neighbors the maintenance fees, but there’s a water leak at Lorena’s apartment. Magdalena invites Carlos to dinner to meet Arturo.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Pedro tells Frankie his idea for a film. Magdalena demands Germán fix a gas leak. The manager tries to fix it, but he just makes everything worse.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Magdalena wants to make an impression on her husband’s boss at dinner, but her hospitality is misplaced on a bill collector. Pedro is disappointed.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Magdalena is excited to find out Arturo is being sent to San Francisco, but she doesn’t know they meant San Francisco, Jalisco, in Mexico.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Magdalena calls a meeting to invite the residents to a Valentine’s Day exchange so she can give away the mortar. Germán and Pedro give Silvia advice.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Germán charges Silvia the maintenance fee. Sarah wears her clothes and eats her food, but she can’t say anything, she spent the money Sarah gave her.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Arturo’s boss asks him to do his son’s homework. Magdalena wants to know who’s stealing electricity, and there are complaints about the maintenance.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Benito helps Frankie come up with ideas for a film script and asks his father for money to produce it. Magdalena wants to buy butt pads.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Benito tells his parents he’s starring in a play. After some psychological testing, Silvia determines that Benito is in love with her.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Frankie finishes a new script for a film, and a producer asks him to send it to him by email. Germán teaches Frankie to use Silvia’s laptop.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Magdalena and Arturo reminisce on how they meet. Arturo is named general manager and Magdalena wants to rent the third floor and expand her apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Luis is happy to receive a call from his ex, who just wants him to babysit her daughter. But he starts suspecting this girl might be his own daughter.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Magdalena hears about the Neighbors Tuesday program and the free services they offer, and tries to convince everyone it’s all thanks to her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Don Roque is depressed, it’s his birthday and no one remembers. He thinks Vanessa is organizing a surprise party, but she’s up to something else.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: An old woman almost runs over Luis, and they decide to install a speed bump. After it’s put in, the residents come up with a new business plan.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Frankie, Lorena and Benito travel to Canada to put on a show, but Benito can’t speak English. Germán gives a damage report after the earthquake.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: At a hotel in Canada, Frankie meets Eugenio Derbez, and he tells him he’s a big fan but he ignores him. Germán says the materials have arrived.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: A preacher wants to rent an apartment in the building. Germán says it’s occupied, but he offers more money, and Germán agrees to rent to him.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: The neighbors hold a meeting to address their apartment problems. Arturo is on vacation, and when he comes back, the neighbors want to see the photos.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Lorena and Macaria suspect that Luis and Pedro might be gay lovers, and start spreading rumors throughout the building before the truth is discovered.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Arturo is worried the house will be foreclosed on, but Germán has a plan. Lorena switches the numbers around, and Silvia gets evicted instead.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Silvia meets Peter online, and decides to go to Canada to visit him. Pedro and Benito laugh at their little joke at Silvia’s expense.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Doña Socorro tells Germán she’s selling the building, and everyone’s going to get evicted. Frankie has a plan to stop her, but Pedro gets in the way.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Magda puts Silvia’s clothes away. Arturo picks up some clothes, accidentally taking Silvia’s sweater. Silvia sees Magda wearing her sweater.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Alejandra wants to get a tattoo, but her parents kick her out when they find out, and she asks Pedro to take her in. Luis can’t stand Alejandra.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Marco and his sister argue over their musical preferences. Roque hears a voice and thinks the building is haunted. Alejandra wants to join a band.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: The residents are frightened when they get a chain letter. They see Vanessa crying and think Don Roque must have died because of the chain letter.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Silvia has two engagements, and asks Germán to help her keep her secret. Leonardo shows up to serenade Silvia at the same time as Santiago.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Magda wants to sell her car, so she offers Pedro a cut if he helps her out. Pedro lends the car to Don Cascarita, who gets in an accident.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: The residents meet in Luis’s apartment, and money is lost and Luis takes the blame. Pedro tells the residents he’s found their money.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Germán is out of shape and the tournament is coming up fast. Benito and Pedro plan to get a new manager. Germán leaves and his job is up for grabs.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: A homeless man is run over in a hit and run, and Frankie takes the blame. Germán finds out that there’s more to this case than meets the eye.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Germán isn’t doing his duties, and the residents are not happy with him. So they hire Sixto to take his place, but the cure is worse than the disease.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: The residents don’t have any water, and Germán says the water hasn’t been paid because of the leaks. Benito shows him how irresponsible he’s been.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Marco asks Alejandra to forge his report card. Magdalena is proud when she sees it, and plans to send him to one of the best schools in the country.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: The residents think the building is haunted. Silvia visits Dr. Cupido, who tries to help her find a man. The ghost hunt leads to Canta Ranas.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Luis buys Frankie’s VCR without realizing there’s a tape stuck in it and it doesn’t work. He demands his money back, but Frankie demands the tape.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Lorena and Frankie take Benito to an audition. They say he’s too young, but Frankie has a plan to get him in, and sabotage the competition, Andrés.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: When Alejandra tries to parlay her psychic gifts into a business, Germán and Pedro do a little too well in selling her mystery to the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: When a neighborhood ping-pong tournament is announced, Germán's boasting threatens his friendship with Luisito and Frankie before it begins.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Germán announces a neighborhood marathon with a grand prize of 15,000 pesos. But on the big day, a series of injuries befall the entrants.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in the wine cellar, Silvia and Luis pass the time with a drunken game of spin the bottle. When Germán rescues them, they'll wish he hadn't.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: When an enraged Magda kicks Arturo out of the house, Pedro takes him in. When Magda learns where he's staying, it sends her fury over the edge.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Magda's promise of "all the conveniences" on a vacation comes back to haunt her when the incidentals start to add up on Silvia's credit card.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: When his new dog bites Magda, Luis agrees to pay for all of her expenses. And there certainly seem to be a lot of them ...
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Frankie lands a meeting with a movie director and organizes a script reading. When Paulina gets involved, the whole enterprise may implode.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: The delegation demands the building be painted, as they’ve already delivered the paint, but the neighbors and the maintenance man have used it all.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Silvia buys a fine sofa, and Magdalena orders the same one out of envy. Her husband isn’t happy and wants to return it, but they don’t accept returns.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The owner of the building leaves her niece in charge of the administration, and her first act is to raise the rent. The neighbors are worried.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The neighbors call Luis to be head of the block, but Chilacas, the head of the gang, runs for the job as well, and Germán eggs them both on.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Germán paints Don Roque’s apartment and makes a mistake. Frankie tries to sell a script, unaware that it’s Benito’s work.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Magdalena receives a letter from an old boyfriend. Germán hears her making an appointment with a friend and tells her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The rumor is circulating in the building that Silvia is lonely. She decides to open up and talk with a friend, but he’s no knight in shining armor.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Two officers collect the security fee, but Magdalena doesn’t pay. When they get home, Arturo sees the door’s been tampered with, and they get robbed.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Pedro is called on to make some infomercials. Benito receives an acting course as a birthday gift, but he’s not interested.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Roque tells everyone he’s receiving an award. The beggar isn’t getting any money, so he works with Benito to pretend he’s blind.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Arturo inherits a cotton candy machine, but Magda kicks him out. Frankie wants to put the machine to good use.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Luis invites his girlfriend Paola to the apartment, and she talks about her ex the whole time. Pedro tries to convince Luis she’s no good for him.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Silvia puts together a summer course, and Magda isn’t happy. As it’s very difficult, she asks Germán and Roque for help, but they’re not a big help.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Magda buys a piano on Arturo’s credit, and the neighbors are annoyed when she starts using it. Germán does a mediocre job fixing up a room to rent.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Germán generates a conflict between Don Roque and Pancho. He orders Magdalena’s gas tank filled, but confuses it with Silvia’s.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Everyone agrees to chip in for a repair, but Luis can’t afford it, so Magda loans him the money and makes him sign an IOU. He’s not happy about it.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Germán goes on vacation and Luis is left in charge of turning on the water pump, but the neighbors take advantage of him.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Magdalena wants a pet, and Arturo gets her a talking parakeet. Later, Arturo says his boss is coming to dinner, and Pedro teaches the bird bad words.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Silvia has to take care of a dog and runs into trouble with the neighbors. Frankie accidentally takes one of Luis’s shirts at the cleaner.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Arturo receives an invitation to a TV competition, and Magda invites Roque, Frankie and Luis. It’s not going so well at first; can they catch up?
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Luis tells Pedro to fill in the hole in the bathroom occupied by Toña the rat. Germán does the job... then throws the extra cement down the drain.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Don Severiano, an older man, is interested in Silvia and sends her gifts. Magda demands Arturo look for a night job, and he gets a job as a mariachi.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: One of Frankie’s scripts lands him an opportunity, and Silvia, who goes to the shoot, is blown away by one of the actors.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: After Silvia’s failed marriage, Luis is still in love with her, and her ex leaves her with a baby. Magda and Alejandra aren’t talking to each other.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Luis calls a meeting because he can’t be the building administrator anymore. Magda will be the new administrator, though not a very good one.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Some nuns offer the neighbors the Miracle Boy doll. They refuse but change their mind when they find out a neighbor won the lottery thanks to him.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Magda impresses Margarita telling her she lives like a wealthy person, and then she gets in debt to keep up appearances.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Luis decides to hire a babysitter to take care of Luisito; a pretty one, according to Pedro. The girl is a gossip, and she’s suspicious of them.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Lorena decides to start working as a saleswoman to get her family out of the crisis and calls on the neighbors to sell her products.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Silvia’s cousin comes to invite her to her bachelorette party, but she realizes the groom is an ex of hers.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: A filmmaker comes and Germán asks for time off. Some neighbors are hired as extras, and Frankie wants in. Silvia thinks she’s found a boyfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Luis’s car breaks down, and Germán recommends a mechanic, but he has some trouble with him and decides to confront him.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Benito goes on foreign exchange, and Patricia takes his place. The director speaks highly of her, but only so he can get rid of the dangerous girl.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A car crashes into the building, and Frankie has evidence of what happened. The guilty party offers cash in exchange for the video, but he wants more.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Magda has to remodel the building because Margarita is coming. Pedro starts working at Neto’s store, and Casimiro comes to help the remodeling.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Arturo López takes out a loan. Pao and Ro return for their son, but Luis refuses, so they demand the boy make up his mind whom he wants to go with.
episodes.title: Episode 13
